name: Juruna Game
description:
"Juruna is a hack and slash fighting game with third person gameplay.
You control a rabbit on a quest for revenge, facing his enemies on his way.

The rabbit game is based on sword and magic combat.
On your journey, seek to evolve and defeat your enemies.


Goal and explore the forest and free the trapped rabbits

In a forest the rabbits were being enslaved by the fox
who had acquired magical powers.
She used these powers to subjugate, enslave the weaker animals and conquer the whole forest and bring chaos.

The rabbit, as the weakest species, was infected and attacked everyone in its path.
One day Juruna's daughter was taken along with the other rabbits.
Even though Juruna is the weakest of the species, he decides to go on a mission to face his enemy and try to recover his daughter and the others.
